function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Modeling and simulating the COVID-19 epidemic using equation-based or agent-based models","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling can lead to incorrect understanding of disease spread and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Validation of models with real data, considering various factors influencing disease spread","Technologies":"Data validation and model calibration software","People":"Researchers, epidemiologists, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Developing an Agent-based Model (ABM) to simulate the dynamics of the COVID-19 epidemic","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of real-world dynamics and behaviors","Mitigation":"Incorporating real-world data, considering diverse social and economic factors","Technologies":"Data collection and integration tools for diverse variables","People":"Model developers, researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Emulating a closed society living on a shared environment in the ABM","Impact":"Misrepresentation of environmental factors influencing disease spread","Mitigation":"Incorporating accurate environmental data, considering spatial and temporal dynamics","Technologies":"Geospatial data integration tools, environmental monitoring technology","People":"Geospatial analysts, environmental scientists, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, environmental monitoring organizations"}]}
